mapper.select: SELECT * FROM milog_log_search_save WHERE store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(1) FROM milog_log_search_save WHERE store_id = #{storeId}
SELECT count( 1 ) FROM milog_log_search_save WHERE name = #{name} AND creator = #{creator}

SELECT *, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT CASE WHEN t.tail IS NULL THEN '' ELSE t.tail END ) tailName, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT CASE WHEN t.tail IS NULL THEN '' ELSE app_name END ) appName FROM ( SELECT save.*, save.query_text queryText, space.space_name spaceName, store.logstoreName storeName, tail.tail tail, tail.app_name app_name FROM milog_log_search_save save LEFT JOIN milog_space space ON save.space_id = space.id LEFT JOIN milog_logstore store ON save.store_id = store.id LEFT JOIN milog_logstail tail ON FIND_IN_SET( tail.id, save.tail_id ) WHERE save.creator = #{creator} AND sort = #{sort} ORDER BY save.order_num ASC ) t GROUP BY t.id
SELECT max(order_num) FROM milog_log_search_save WHERE creator = #{creator} AND sort = #{sort}
SELECT count(1) FROM milog_log_search_save WHERE creator = #{creator} AND store_id = #{storeId} AND sort = 3
SELECT count(1) FROM milog_log_search_save WHERE creator = #{creator} AND tail_id = #{tailId} AND sort = 2
